name: Miya's Potion Delivery Service
description:
Inspired by the Princess Remedy Series

!!FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING!!

Made to celebrate getting 400 followers on Twitter... nearly 400 extra followers later and here we are!

Story

Cecilia, a potion selling witch, tells her best friend and pupil, Miya, that she is going on a trip. She intrusts Miya to do some potion deliveries in her place. Miya takes up the task and goes out into to the world giving potions to those who want them.

Gameplay

Gameplay is split into 2 modes, Overworld Mode, and Battle Mode. 

Overworld Mode is full of exploration and dialog from the various NPCs scattered in the top down world map. Maybe you'll find a chest with a stat boost inside, or maybe you'll encounter someone interested in buying a potion... at that point you'll enter Battle Mode.

In Battle Mode, you must defeat all waves of enemies in 2D platforming bullet hell combat. By doing so, you can sell potions to the NPCs you find. After the battle you'll be brought right back to Overworld Mode so you can keep exploring.

Sell enough potions in Battle Mode to open the Toll Gates in Overworld Mode and progress in the Map.
